description.en: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.ar: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.br: As Luvas do Dragão Sangrento Todo-Poderoso.
description.cns: 全能嗜血龙套装之手套。 穿上所有 4 件将给你惊人的能力提升！ 戴上面具和/或披风以获得更大的力量！
description.de: Die Handschuhe des Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Alle 4 Teile gemeinsam getragen geben unglaubliche Boni! Trage Maske und Umhang für noch mehr Macht!
description.fi: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.fil: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.fr: Gants du set du Dragon Sanguinaire Immortel. Porter les 4 pièces d'équipement accorde de fantastiques bonus ! Portez le masque et/ou la cape pour encore plus de puissance !
description.id: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Mengenakan semua 4 buah akan memberi Anda bonus luar biasa! Kenakan topeng dan / atau jubah untuk kekuatan yang lebih besar!
description.it: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.jp: 破壊のブラッドドラゴンセットの手袋。4つのパーツを全て身につけると強者になれます！マスクやマントを着用すると、さらにパワーアップ!
description.kr: 전능하신 블러드 드래곤의 장갑 세트. 4 개를 모두 착용하면 놀라운 보너스를받을 수 있습니다! 더 많은 힘을 위해 마스크 및 / 또는 망토를 착용하십시오!
description.nl: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.pl: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.ru: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.sp: Los Guantes del Conjunto del Dragón Sanguinario Todopoderoso. ¡Usar las 4 partes te otorgará bonificaciones increíbles! ¡Usa la máscara y/o la capa para obtener aún más poder!
description.sw: The Gloves of the Almighty Blood Dragon Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Wear the mask and/or cloak for even more power!
description.th: เซตถุงมือแห่งมังกรโลหิตผู้ทรงอำนาจ การสวมใส่ทั้ง 4 ชิ้นจะทำให้คุณได้รับโบนัสที่น่าทึ่ง! สวมหน้ากากและ/หรือเสื้อคลุมเพื่อเพิ่มพลัง!
description.tw: 全能血龍的手套套裝。穿上全 4 件會有更好的效果！再穿上面具或斗篷可以獲得更強大的力量！
description.vi: Bộ Găng Tay Của Huyết Long Toàn Năng. Mặc tất cả 4 mảnh sẽ cấp cho bạn tiền thưởng tuyệt vời! Đeo mặt nạ hoặc áo choàng để có thêm sức mạnh!
